sections.heading: Rentals; previous use validated
sections.text: The use heretofore made by the Board of Educational Lands and Funds of rentals received from saline lands, by placing them in the temporary instead of the permanent school fund, is validated and approved.SourceLaws 1943, c. 156, ยง 2, p. 566;R.S.1943, ยง 72-502.01.
